intro: Zulatia levigata, commonly known as the smooth zulatia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, yellow flowers arranged in clusters. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments. Zulatia levigata is often found in open vegetation types such as savannas and grasslands.
